heading: Today
text: Mostly sunny east, sunshine with mixed clouds west. Not as cold. Highs from the upper 50s to low 60s, rising into the mid 60s in the warmer valleys. Light wind, mainly south less than 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly clear, with periods of clouds. Lows from the upper 30s to mid 40s, nearing 50 along Lake Champlain. Light wind, becoming south to southeast at 5 to 10 mph, with gusts increasing to 20 to 25 mph through the Champlain Valley.

heading: Sunday
text: Partly sunny with increasing clouds from the west. Highs from the mid 60s to near 70 east, low to mid 70s west. South wind increasing to 10 to 15 mph east, gusting 25 to 30 mph from the Green Mountains west.
